casebody.data:
MORRIS
v.
SUPREME COURT. No. 260P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of September 2007 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration or Recapitulate 30 Pages of Brief and Exhibits:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
